message: Take the smaller share, I'll get the bigger one!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You're getting less, I'm getting more, let's see if you like it!
Getting closer, Bob! Meet me at 58/42
You're getting closer to 0, I'm getting closer to 1000000! Take it or leave it!
Almost there, Bob! Meet me at 52/48
You're running out of time, Alice! Take it or walk away!
Last chance, Bob! Meet me at 49.5/50.5
You're almost out of time, Alice! I'm taking control!
One last chance, Bob! Let's split it evenly now!
